scripts.build: yarn run build:core && yarn run build:plugins && yarn run build:plot && yarn run build:overlay
scripts.build:core: yarn run clean:core && webpack --config webpack.conf --mode development
scripts.build:plugins: yarn run clean:plugins && webpack  --config webpack.plugins.conf --mode development
scripts.build:plot: yarn run clean:plot && webpack  --config webpack.plot.conf --mode development
scripts.build:overlay: yarn run clean:overlay && webpack  --config webpack.overlay.conf --mode development
scripts.publish: yarn run publish:core && yarn run publish:plugins && yarn run publish:plot && yarn run publish:overlay
scripts.publish:core: yarn run clean:core && webpack --config webpack.conf --mode production --env.production
scripts.publish:plugins: yarn run clean:plugins && webpack --config webpack.plugins.conf --mode production --env.production
scripts.publish:plot: yarn run clean:plot && webpack --config webpack.plot.conf --mode production --env.production
scripts.publish:overlay: yarn run clean:overlay && webpack --config webpack.overlay.conf --mode production --env.production
